author: mrmitch
title: Another Pirate and Alligator for $2.00  Oh Yea !
review: We have a number of the 4 Junior Pirate sets, and when I came across this set for the price I had to have it for our collection. Pretty cool wine jug with the set, can always use another alligator in our LEGO town. Another Pirate to play or fight with the rest of our crew.

author: legoman4694
title: i guess its ok
review: my brother gave it to me. its just got a pirate, a sword a crocodile and a jug. its less that 10 pieces. i never got any of the other 4+ pirate sets so he is my only fig from that series. if you like the series get it but if not hmm.....

author: hustla187
title: blah
review: This is worse than the regular Pirates theme Lego made. The figures look too Jack Stone-like and the croc is smaller than the figure. Is the croc supposed to be bigger? I think so. This is only a 2 out of 5 and it needs work to be a 5.

author: rockrage
title: meh
review:
i was a bit disapointed when i got this

pros: crocodile
         jug thing
        cool sword


cons: its missing something...
         the prate looks a bit weird

overall   6/10
          
                     i would not recomend this to you but if you want
                   a crocidile and a cool jug i guess you should get it
